Description: NOTE: Free shipping is to the lower 48 states only. All others please request shipping quote. I am happy to ship to international bidders! All auctions require PayPal. All my guitars carry the "used" stamp required by all manufacturers before releasing any guitar for resale. Please see the description and pictures and you will see- these are terrific buys! This Epiphone Prophecy Les Paul Custom Prophecy Plus features a solid mahogany body with quilt maple top, Speed Taper D profile neck with rosewood fretboard and inlays, TuneOMatic bridge with stop bar tailpiece and EMG 81/85 humbuckers. Comes to you in its Epiphone hardshell case with logo. No flaws or repairs-like new!One very sweet deal on a very sweet guitar that lists at $1332!________________________________________About my guitars: I hand pick my guitars from manufacturer and dealer resale stock, selecting only quality instruments. Most have no flaws at all. Any that had blemishes have been restored by an expert luthier and I am careful to report as accurately as I can anything that has been refinished. They are stamped with a tiny "used" on the back of headstock and serial partially removed to prevent dishonest dealers from selling you an instrument claiming it is warranteed. What you get is a brand name, quality instrument for a fraction of the cost.Features· Body Type:Solid body · Body Shape:Les Paul · Left-/Right-handed:Right-handed · Number of Strings:6 · Body Material:Mahogany · Top Material:Quilt Maple · Body Finish:Gloss · Color:Midnight Sapphire · Neck Material:Mahogany, Set · Neck Shape:SpeedTaper D-profile · Radius:14" · Fingerboard Material:Rosewood · Fingerboard Inlay:Mother of Pearl and Abalone Block and Triangle · Number of Frets:24, Jumbo · Scale Length:24.75" · Nut Width:1.687" · Nut Material:Graphite · Bridge/Tailpiece:LockTone Tune-o-Matic/LockTone Stopbar · Tuners:Sealed · Number of Pickups:2 · Neck Pickup:EMG-85 Humbucker · Bridge Pickup:EMG-81 Humbucker · Controls:2 x volume, 2 x tone, 3-way toggle pickup switch BACK OF HEADSTOCK stamped used as required by all MFGS before releasing any instrument for resale to void false warranty claims · Bid with confidence! Thanks!" -Perry· · I will only sell guitars I would like to own myself. I stand behind what I sell and will accept a return if you are not satisfied for full refund less shipping provided the guitar is returned insured, in the same packaging you received it in, and packed for return just as you received it. Instruments that have been altered or tampered with in any way cannot be returned- sorry! Shipping includes double boxing, ample padding, and insurance (packaging alone costs me over $10!)· About Shipping costs: The size of the box makes shipping any guitar pretty pricey. Packaging alone cost over $10. I charge less for shipping than my actual costs in an effort to offer you the best possible deal on a quality instrument! I pay for insurance, and signature required delivery as well as quality heavy duty box and packing materials- I go the extra mile to make sure your guitar arrives perfectly! Shipping to Alaska, Hawaii and international is additonal-please provide postal code for quote. International bidders are responsible for customs fees required by their country.
